channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Court Cam
channel.desc: A brawl breaks out between supporters of both the victim and the defendant at a sentencing hearing; a man refuses to cooperate at his plea hearing; a 56-year-old defendant asks his mother to explain why he can't pay his court costs and fines.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Court Cam
channel.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments; a Massachusetts courtroom erupts in a storm of fists and f-bombs; a judge pays the price for her outrageous behavior; a doctor appears for a hearing via Zoom during surgery.
